Name: Export-Counter
Synopsis: Exports performance counter data to log files.

Name: Get-Counter
Synopsis: Gets performance counter data from local and remote computers.

Name: Get-WinEvent
Synopsis: Gets events from event logs and event tracing log files on local and remote computers.

Name: Import-Counter
Synopsis: Imports performance counter log files and creates the objects that represent each counter sample in the log.

Name: New-WinEvent
Synopsis: Creates a new Windows event for the specified event provider.
